Title: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Emerald Tablet
Writer: Manuel Burque, Josep Gatell, Neil Landau
Actors: Óscar Barberán, Luis Posada, Michelle Jenner
Plot: Tad accidentally unleashes an ancient spell endangering the lives of his friends: Mummy, Jeff and Belzoni. With everyone against him and only helped by Sara, he sets off on an adventure, in order to put an end to the curse of the ...
